full_text.0: Over the last week, @WindowDressers, an organization that builds affordable, insulating window inserts, has used ECHO as a community build location. Through builds, volunteers have been working together to build inserts that function as custom, interior-mounted storm windows. https://t.co/Q2PA9AlkDP
full_text.1: The Rev. Maurice Moreau's view just got a lot better. https://t.co/kIBcoKWp6r
full_text.2: Our opening day will be Saturday, Nov. 19! The Fourrunner Quad will start at 8 a.m., the Adventure Triple and Meadows Carpet at 9 a.m. Ticket windows at the Mansfield Base Lodge will be open 9-4 this Friday. Please note: All main base area parking is free until Dec. 2. #StoweMT https://t.co/5zSfc4WbO4
full_text.3: The windows project began in 2021 and, when it is completed this winter, 28 double-hung window units and one over-door fan light sash will have been restored and reinstalled in the museum's iconic Judd-Harris House.
full_text.4: Jeff Fellinger, Willard Street Traditions restoration artist, recently reinstalls a set of restored windows on the first floor of the Judd-Harris House. https://t.co/D2710SV9iq
full_text.5: @kylenabecker I don't see breaking windows and hitting police in your ignorant post... I don't think mommy cooked you long enough. Climb back in?
full_text.6: @KeithLangham2 Windows are new, no furniture against the exterior wall, chimney pointing sound, leading checked, tiles checked, chimney pot has a cap/cowl on it, bathroom has an extractor fan. There is a leak/seep around the chimney breast, no one has been able to fix it! It's driving me nuts.
full_text.7: @lifestyle_a2z Like I care I sleep with the windows open in the winter cold as a morgue. When I sleep.
full_text.8: Just in case anyone is wondering what kind of specs those Fruit Ninja arcade cabinets are running, I got you. Found one that had crashed back to Windows (didn't realize it was on Windows), and brought up the on screen keyboard to dig around. Kind of overkill? https://t.co/nhKxs5ZWo2
full_text.9:
We don't currently have home tests for flu/RSV but we can reduce aerosol exposure by:
➡️ masking
➡️ opening windows/increasing ventilation 
➡️ gathering outside
➡️ HEPA filters - commercial or #corsirosenthalbox

full_text.16: @ZstormVR I have a Pimax 5k XR.  I got the eye tracker module for it.  It worked well enough.  I decided not to use the headset for a while, when I hooked it back up, the eye tracker refused to work no matter what.  Windows did detect it.  It also sometimes displays static on one screen.
full_text.17: @LaurenKMaloney I heard an agency done commercial on TV… in our market.. a good 15 years ago now. It was for Andersen Windows. The outcue said.. “Available at the Home Showcase ..at Allen Lumber in “Bar” Nothing quite says voiced out of the area… like that.

full_text.21:
@727Phoenix Even in CA, my windows didn't let in a lot of sunlight, and I'm sure that didn't help any. Here, I get all the sun I want, and the sunsets are spectacular.

Daylight Savings Time has never affected me. I never get jetlag, either. Not sure why not.
